channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-39204|2024-08-29T15:20:45.432Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom clients may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39206|2024-08-29T15:45:07.488Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom clients may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39202|2024-08-29T15:21:02.476Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20client%20for%20windows%20and%20zoom%20vdi%20client
item.description: Untrusted search path in Zoom Rooms Client for Windows and Zoom VDI Client may allow a privileged user to conduct a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-43588|2024-08-29T15:39:14.149Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Insufficient control flow management in some Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct an information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39199|2024-08-29T15:44:49.906Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Cryptographic issues with In-Meeting Chat for some Zoom clients may allow a privileged user to conduct an information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-43582|2024-08-29T15:38:56.542Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper authorization in some Zoom clients may allow an authorized user to conduct an escalation of privilege via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39205|2024-08-29T15:20:19.803Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20clients
item.description: Improper conditions check in Zoom Team Chat for Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27244|2024-08-02T00:27:59.863Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20workplace%20vdi%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the installer for Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27247|2024-08-02T00:27:59.974Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20macos
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for macOS before version 5.17.10 may allow a privileged user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27243|2024-08-02T00:28:00.293Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- see%20references
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDK’s may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27242|2024-08-02T00:27:59.871Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20linux
item.description: Cross site scripting in Zoom Desktop Client for Linux before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.
